Class.ClassComment: KeyValueFilter /** * A filter for keys with their values. This class is complemented by the {@link org.infinispan.filter.KeyFilter}class. This filter should be used in most cases over {@link org.infinispan.filter.KeyFilter} since it allowsfor more control of the filtering since it provides the ability to filter on the value and metadata in addition to the key. * @author William Burns * @since 7.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * @param key key to test * @param value value to use (could be null for the case of removal) * @param metadata metadata * @return true if the given key is accepted by this filter. */
